data.eml:eml: A new species of Bauhinia L. (Caesalpinioideae, Leguminosae) from Nakhon Phanom Province, Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chatan, Wannachai (2013): A new species of Bauhinia L. (Caesalpinioideae, Leguminosae) from Nakhon Phanom Province, Thailand. PhytoKeys 26: 1-5, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.26.6008, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.26.6008
